body: Huh. Never thought I'd see a Princess Tears doujin. Kinda wish the game was in english so i didn't have to use a hook and translate tool.
Damn it Saitama why does it have to be you!?
I think it should be ok as long as they dont shake the girl too much.. Good stuff btw except for making her sex slave. I still prefer vanilla

Alright lets start an argument here minna san i have a question
Is having sex while the girl is pregnant okay? It doesnt have a bad effects right and is it okay for the baby and ofcourse the pregnant woman answer if you want to answer and 10/10 this parody
This is actually a parody of a famous game, do you know?

Basically she needed money for school's expenses and her options were the colosseum or housework. The bald man hired her but she was terrible at housework. One day she decided to take a nap and the guy took the chance. Next day she was faking being alseep and things further scalated. She keeps saying that she hate being abused but truth is she is a tsundere and enjoys the sex. Up to page 31 the guy propose to her that she should become his sex-maid. At the end she wants to have his baby.
